vars.adventure_desc: The Solar Navy has decided to remove the Aegis Consulate from Pirate's Point... and if they can get rid of the pirates at the same time, so much the better.
vars.default_mission_exploration_music: Monkey Warhol - Boots and Pants Instrumental Mix.ogg

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?

vars.dialogue_text: We are here to get rid of the Aegis Consulate, but the rulers of Pirate's Point aren't going to be happy about us barging in, so we'll probably have to fight them as well.

Your job will be to capture territories one at a time. You can only attack from a territory we already control. Once a faction's home base has been captured, that faction will be eliminated. The Aegis Consulate is due south from here, along the coastline.
vars.subject: get rid of the Aegis Consulate

vars.dialogue_text: That thing I said about capturing a home base? It also applies to us. During the operation, you have to make sure that enemy troops don't get too close to the Solar Navy camp. If this base is captured, we'll have no choice but to abort the operation.

dialogue_data.reply: Is there anything else I need to know?

vars.subject: The Aegis Consulate is due south from here

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?

vars.dialogue_text: Your mission will be to move troops into unguarded territories, and take back any territory captured by our enemies. Capturing an enemy's home base will remove them from the battle. But be careful- if the uptown district gets captured, we'll be the ones who lose.

vars.message: The Solar Navy has declared that it is going to remove the Aegis Consulate from Pirate's Point. You arrive at the military camp they have set up just north of the city. There should be plenty of opportunities to find good work here.

You are in Pirate's Point to do some shopping and visit some old friends when suddenly the air raid siren goes off. You quickly learn that the Solar Navy has attacked, intending to destroy the Aegis Consulate in the southern part of town.
As a freelance mecha pilot, you're not sure whether to be glad about all the missions that are likely to be available or terrified because you are standing in the middle of a bona fide war zone.

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?

vars.dialogue_text: Our objective is to capture the Solar Navy's base. When a faction's home base is captured, that faction loses the war. We must also defend the Lunar district. The pirate scum who run this city will also try to fight, but they may end up getting in our way.

vars.waypoint_desc: The majority of Terra's surface is uninhabitable, covered with a layer of dihydrogen monoxide that can be kilometers deep in places. The people of Terra wage endless war over the tiny scraps of inhabitable land.

Mecha technology on Terra has not progressed since the fall of the superpowers. Ancient designs such as the Claymore are still in common use. Even though the Terrans have lost all knowledge of how these machines work, they are able to build facsimiles in primitive workshops using blueprints passed down through the generations.
The habitable areas of Terra are plagued by mutant monstrosities. It can be dangerous to go outside, even in ostensibly civilized areas such as the Lunar District.

The majority of Terra's population consists of wandering barbarian hordes known as ravagers. The ravagers steal what they want from an area before moving on to their next target. They obey no laws and have no knowledge of humanity's glorious past.

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?
vars.exploration_music: Anthem of Rain - Rock This House (Instrumental).ogg

vars.dialogue_text: That's what I like to hear. I offer artwork for all budgets and pain thresholds. You can get a basic tattoo for $80,000, a deluxe tattoo for $200,000, or a masterpiece for $650,000.

dialogue_data.reply: I'd like to get a tattoo, please.

vars.subject: kira_tattoo_1234567890

vars.dialogue_text: You've already gotten a tattoo, and thanks to the war happening outside I've run out of needles. Sorry.

dialogue_data.reply: I'd like to get a tattoo, please.

vars.dialogue_text: [HELLO] Welcome to Kira's Tattoos and Body Moodification.

For that, you can use the cyber terminal over there. My robotic surgical bench will install any parts you want. It's probably safer and more hygenic than when I used to do things by hand, but not nearly as much fun.
A good choice for a beginner. This design may be small, but the quality is unsurpassed. Just lie back and try to think happy thoughts.

dialogue_data.reply: I would like the basic tattoo, please.

vars.subject: kira_tattoo_1234567890

vars.badge_desc: You received a basic tattoo from Kira.

vars.message: You lie on the tattoo bench and the process begins. It is a little uncomfortable, but nothing you can't handle.

vars.dialogue_text: The most popular choice. Choose your design, then lie back and relax. You may feel a bit of discomfort.

dialogue_data.reply: I'm interested in the deluxe tattoo.

vars.subject: kira_tattoo_1234567890

vars.badge_desc: You received a deluxe tattoo from Kira. Now everyone can see your adventurous spirit.

vars.message: You lie on the tattoo bench and the process begins. Kira was wrong; you don't feel a bit of discomfort. You feel a great deal of discomfort, as though you were being attacked by a swarm of artistic hornets.

vars.dialogue_text: [UNDERSTOOD] If you ever change your mind, you know where to come.

dialogue_data.reply: On second thought, maybe I don't want a tattoo right now.

vars.subject: kira_tattoo_1234567890

vars.dialogue_text: Wow, it's rare that I get the chance to meet someone with such passion for art. Lie down on the tattoo bench and we'll get started right away. By the way, this is going to hurt a lot.

dialogue_data.reply: I can't settle for less than the masterpiece.

vars.subject: kira_tattoo_1234567890

vars.badge_desc: You received a masterpiece tattoo from Kira. Annyone who knows the value of such things will now recognize both your adventurous spirit and your good taste.

vars.message: You lie on the tattoo bench and the process begins. Kira brings you to the edge of hell. Just when you think you cannot stand any more, the tattoo is finished and you have become a living work of art.

vars.waypoint_desc: You stand before Kira's tattoo chair. It looks more like a PreZero torture device.

vars.dialogue_text: [HELLO] The Nogos is the rowdiest part of town... Or at least it was until the war started.
It wouldn't be a bad neighborhood if not for the street gangs. And the monsters wandering in from the dead zone. Plus the lack of infrastruucture, security, hope...

vars.waypoint_desc: You stand before a bookshelf  filled with romance novels.

vars.dg_explo_music: Anthem of Rain - Rock This House (Instrumental).ogg

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?

vars.message: This appears to be the wreckage of the spaceship which crashed, creating the scrapyard in the first place.

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?
vars.exploration_music: Anthem of Rain - So My Love - Instrumental.ogg

vars.dialogue_text: [HELLO] I've been stuck here because of the fighting, and haven't even been able to make any money off of it.

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?
Where do you want to go?
vars.exploration_music: Anthem of Rain - So My Love - Instrumental.ogg

vars.entrance_desc: Where do you want to go?
Where do you want to go?
